name: CRUD Container
short_description:
Generic component to simplify the creation of a CRUD based cluster of forms etc with little extra configuration beyond creating the forms.

The CRUDContainer component provides a dynamic menu and a set of views similar to the functionality provided by a manually created set of ButtonBar, ViewStack & NavigatorContent. 

The CRUDContainer however is not index based, the container wraps a selection of ActionableContainers, which simply need to be configured with a chosen 'action' and whether or not this is to be included in the dynamically created MenuBar.
summary: Components to provide common CRUD (+search) functionality
